en: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds -
for them are the Gardens of Pleasure,
[it is] the promise of Allah [which is] truth.
And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
He created the heavens without pillars that you see
and has cast into the earth firmly set mountains,
lest it should shift with you,
and dispersed therein from every creature.

ar: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا
en: And We sent down rain from the sky and made grow therein [plants]

ar: فَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ كَرِيمٍ
en: and made grow therein [plants] of every noble kind.
This is the creation of Allah.
This is the creation of Allah.

ar: فَأَرُونِى مَاذَا خَلَقَ الَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِ
en: So show Me what those other than Him have created.
Rather, the wrongdoers are in clear error.
